channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As KPop Demon Hunters’ Netflix Reign Ends, Here’s What’s Next
item.description: KPop Demon Hunters is no longer on Netflix's most-watched movie list, but here is what the series has planned after this.

item.title: Substack Hacked — What 50 Million Users Need To Know
item.description: Substack, the hugely popular online content platform with 50 million active subscribers, has confirmed it has been hacked. Here’s what you need to kno...

item.title: Photo-Sharing Platform Flickr Issues Data Breach Warning
item.description: Flickr has 35 million monthly users and hosts 28 billion photos. It has now also confirmed a potential data breach.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Saturday, February 7
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Waymo Builds Fancy AI-Based Simulator Tool To Improve Robotaxi Tests
item.description: You want to test a robocar in a simulation of everything you can think of. Now Waymo has built an AI tool with Google Gemini to make that easier to do

item.title: Voluntary stories

item.title: Precision vs. accuracy
